description:
The spirit known as the `Beehive Priest` has sucked out Enma-kun`s brain and left him acting like nothing more than a little baby. In order to get his brain back, Yukiko-hime and the others are forced into entering a tournament with the Beehive Priest - but the tournament seems to be about harassing Yukiko-hime and Harumi more than anything else... but just when things are looking down, a mysterious near-naked new-comer arrives!
How will the tournament turn out? Who will be the victor? Who is this mysterious beauty? Will Enma-kun ever return to his normal self again?
Source: Official Site

titles.title: An All-girls Competition in the Beehive! With Chapeau-jii?
Onna Darake no Dai Hachi no Sutaikai!
女だらけの大ハチの巣大会! シャッポじいもおるかも?
